proto.name: frame
proto.showname: Frame 1: 150 bytes on wire (1200 bits), 150 bytes captured (1200 bits)

field.name: frame.encap_type
field.showname: Encapsulation type: IEEE 802.11 plus radiotap radio header (23)

field.name: frame.offset_shift
field.showname: Time shift for this packet: 0.000000000 seconds

field.name: frame.time_delta
field.showname: Time delta from previous captured frame: 0.000000000 seconds

field.name: frame.time_delta_displayed
field.showname: Time delta from previous displayed frame: 0.000000000 seconds

field.name: frame.time_relative
field.showname: Time since reference or first frame: 0.000000000 seconds

field.name: radiotap.channel.flags
field.showname: Channel flags: 0x00a0, Complementary Code Keying (CCK), 2 GHz spectrum

field.name: radiotap.channel.flags.half
field.showname: .0.. .... .... .... = Half Rate Channel (10MHz Channel Width): False

field.name: radiotap.channel.flags.quarter
field.showname: 0... .... .... .... = Quarter Rate Channel (5MHz Channel Width): False

field.name: _ws.expert
field.showname: Expert Info (Warning/Assumption): No preamble length information was available, assuming short preamble.

field.name: wlan_radio.assumed.short_preamble
field.showname: No preamble length information was available, assuming short preamble.

field.name: _ws.expert.message
field.showname: Message: No preamble length information was available, assuming short preamble.
field.show: No preamble length information was available, assuming short preamble.

field.name: wlan.fc.ds
field.showname: .... ..00 = DS status: Not leaving DS or network is operating in AD-HOC mode (To DS: 0 From DS: 0) (0x0)

field.name: wlan.fc.tods
field.showname: .... ...0 = To DS: Frame is not entering DS

field.name: wlan.fc.fromds
field.showname: .... ..0. = From DS: Frame is not exiting DS

field.name: wlan.fc.frag
field.showname: .... .0.. = More Fragments: This is the last fragment

field.name: wlan.fc.retry
field.showname: .... 0... = Retry: Frame is not being retransmitted

field.name: wlan.fc.pwrmgt
field.showname: ...0 .... = PWR MGT: STA will stay up

field.name: wlan.fc.protected
field.showname: .0.. .... = Protected flag: Data is not protected

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.ldpccoding
field.showname: .... .... .... ...0 = HT LDPC coding capability: Transmitter does not support receiving LDPC coded packets

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.width
field.showname: .... .... .... ..0. = HT Support channel width: Transmitter only supports 20MHz operation

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.sm
field.showname: .... .... .... 11.. = HT SM Power Save: SM Power Save disabled (0x3)

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.green
field.showname: .... .... ...0 .... = HT Green Field: Transmitter is not able to receive PPDUs with Green Field (GF) preamble

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.short40
field.showname: .... .... .0.. .... = HT Short GI for 40MHz: Not supported

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.rxstbc
field.showname: .... ..00 .... .... = HT Rx STBC: No Rx STBC support (0x0)

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.delayedblockack
field.showname: .... .0.. .... .... = HT Delayed Block ACK: Transmitter does not support HT-Delayed BlockAck

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.dsscck
field.showname: ...1 .... .... .... = HT DSSS/CCK mode in 40MHz: Will/Can use DSSS/CCK in 40 MHz

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.psmp
field.showname: ..0. .... .... .... = HT PSMP Support: Won't/Can't support PSMP operation

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.40mhzintolerant
field.showname: .0.. .... .... .... = HT Forty MHz Intolerant: Use of 40 MHz transmissions unrestricted/allowed

field.name: wlan.ht.capabilities.lsig
field.showname: 0... .... .... .... = HT L-SIG TXOP Protection support: Not supported

field.name: wlan.ht.mcsset
field.showname: Rx Supported Modulation and Coding Scheme Set: MCS Set

field.name: wlan.ht.mcsset.rxbitmask
field.showname: Rx Modulation and Coding Scheme (One bit per modulation): 1 spatial stream

field.name: wlan.ht.mcsset.txsetdefined
field.showname: .... .... .... ...0 = Tx Supported MCS Set: Not defined

field.name: wlan.ht.mcsset.txrxmcsnotequal
field.showname: .... .... .... ..0. = Tx and Rx MCS Set: Equal

field.name: wlan.ht.mcsset.txmaxss
field.showname: .... .... .... 00.. = Maximum Number of Tx Spatial Streams Supported: 0x0, TX MCS Set Not Defined

field.name: wlan.htex.capabilities.transtime
field.showname: .... .... .... .00. = Time needed to transition between 20MHz and 40MHz: No Transition (0x0)

field.name: wlan.htex.capabilities.mcs
field.showname: .... ..00 .... .... = MCS Feedback capability: STA does not provide MCS feedback (0x0)

field.name: wlan.txbf.rxndp
field.showname: .... .... .... .... .... .... .... 0... = Receive Null Data packet (NDP): Not supported

field.name: wlan.txbf.txndp
field.showname: .... .... .... .... .... .... ...0 .... = Transmit Null Data packet (NDP): Not supported

field.name: wlan.txbf.csi
field.showname: .... .... .... .... .... ...0 .... .... = STA can apply TxBF using CSI explicit feedback: Not supported

field.name: wlan.txbf.fm.uncompressed.tbf
field.showname: .... .... .... .... .... ..0. .... .... = STA can apply TxBF using uncompressed beamforming feedback matrix: Not supported

field.name: wlan.txbf.fm.compressed.tbf
field.showname: .... .... .... .... .... .0.. .... .... = STA can apply TxBF using compressed beamforming feedback matrix: Not supported

field.name: wlan.txbf.rcsi
field.showname: .... .... .... .... ...0 0... .... .... = Receiver can return explicit CSI feedback: not supported (0x0)

field.name: wlan.txbf.fm.uncompressed.rbf
field.showname: .... .... .... .... .00. .... .... .... = Receiver can return explicit uncompressed Beamforming Feedback Matrix: not supported (0x0)

field.name: wlan.txbf.fm.compressed.bf
field.showname: .... .... .... ...0 0... .... .... .... = STA can compress and use compressed Beamforming Feedback Matrix: not supported (0x0)

field.name: wlan.txbf.mingroup
field.showname: .... .... .... .00. .... .... .... .... = Minimal grouping used for explicit feedback reports: No grouping supported (0x0)

field.name: wlan.txbf.csinumant
field.showname: .... .... ...0 0... .... .... .... .... = Max antennae STA can support when CSI feedback required: 1 TX antenna sounding (0x0)

field.name: wlan.txbf.fm.uncompressed.maxant
field.showname: .... .... .00. .... .... .... .... .... = Max antennae STA can support when uncompressed Beamforming feedback required: 1 TX antenna sounding (0x0)

field.name: wlan.txbf.fm.compressed.maxant
field.showname: .... ...0 0... .... .... .... .... .... = Max antennae STA can support when compressed Beamforming feedback required: 1 TX antenna sounding (0x0)

field.name: wlan.txbf.csi.maxrows
field.showname: .... .00. .... .... .... .... .... .... = Maximum number of rows of CSI explicit feedback: 1 row of CSI (0x0)

field.name: wlan.txbf.channelest
field.showname: ...0 0... .... .... .... .... .... .... = Maximum number of space time streams for which channel dimensionscan be simultaneously estimated: 1 space time stream (0x0)

field.name: wlan.asel.txcsi
field.showname: .... ..0. = Explicit CSI Feedback Based Tx ASEL: Not supported

field.name: wlan.asel.txif
field.showname: .... .0.. = Antenna Indices Feedback Based Tx ASEL: Not supported
